posts.title: How's Your Summer (Really) Going?
posts.author: Ronald McDonald
posts.text: Do you know something? Summer is hard, especially during a pandemic.

posts.title: Handling Confusion in the Front-End
posts.author: Joe Schmoe
posts.text: React learning is difficult. There's not a better way around it.

posts.title: The Reasons Software Engineers Aren't Nerds
posts.author: Grace Fleming
posts.text: Software Engineers arent nerds. Let me say that again.
